translation.Choisissez une carte et placez-la dans v: Choose a card and place it in your draft area
translation.Les autres joueurs doivent choisir une c: Other players must choose a development card
translation.Les joueurs doivent choisir une carte dé: Players must choose a development card
translation.Les joueurs révèlent la carte qu’ils ont: Players reveal the card they have chosen
translation.Les joueurs passent le reste du paquet à: The players pass the rest of the cards to the left
The players pass the rest of the cards to the right
translation.Vous devez mettre en construction ou rec: You must slate for construction or recycle each card in your draft area
translation.Placez vos ressources sur vos développem: Place your resources on your developments under construction or your Empire card
translation.Cliquez sur <0>Valider</0> si vous êtes: Click on <0>Validate</0> if you are ready to proceed to {resource, select, Materials{materials} Energy{energy} Science{science} Gold{gold} other{exploration}} production
translation.Les autres joueurs doivent faire leur pl: The other players have to do their planning
translation.Les joueurs doivent faire leur planifica: Players have to do their planning
translation.Placez les ressources produites sur vos: Place the resources produced on your developments under construction or your Empire card
translation.Vous recevez un {character, select, Fina: You receive a {character, select, Financier{Financier} other{General}} for your {resource, select, Materials{Materials} Energy{Energy} Science{Science} Gold{Gold} other{Exploration}} production supremacy
translation.{player} recoit un {character, select, F: {player} receives a {character, select, Financier{Financier} other{General}} for producing the most {resource, select, Materials{Materials} Energy{Energy} Science{Science} Gold{Gold} other{Exploration}}
translation.Cliquez sur <0>Valider</0> si vous êtes: Click on <0>Validate</0> if you are ready to proceed to the next round
translation.Cliquez sur <0>Valider</0> pour passer a: Click on <0>Validate</0> to proceed to the calculation of the scores
translation.Les autres joueurs doivent utiliser les: The other players must use the resources produced
translation.Les joueurs doivent utiliser les ressour: Players must use the resources produced
translation.Victoire ! Vous gagnez la partie avec {s: Victory! You win the game with {score} points
Victory! You win the game with {score} points and {developments} developments built

translation.Victoire ! Vous gagnez la partie avec {s: Victory! You win the game with {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.{player} gagne la partie avec {score} po: {player} wins the game with {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.Égalité parfaite ! Tous les joueurs ont: Perfect tie! All players each have {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.Égalité parfaite ! {player1} et {player2: Perfect tie! {player1} and {player2} each have {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.Égalité parfaite ! {player1}, {player2}: Perfect tie! {player1}, {player2} and {player3} each have {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.Égalité parfaite ! {player1}, {player2},: Perfect tie! {player1}, {player2}, {player3} and {player4} each have {score} points, {developments} developments and {characters} characters
translation.Pour jouer, veuillez incliner votre mobi: To play, please rotate your mobile
translation.Une action n’a pas pu aboutir et a été a: An action could not be completed and was canceled. Are you still connected to the Internet?
translation.Les autres joueurs ont déjà joué, votre: The other players have already played, your move could not be canceled.
translation.Votre proposition a été transmise aux au: You offer was sent to the other players

translation.Un cube gris représentant la ressource «: A grey cube depicting the "Materials" resource
translation.Un cube noir représentant la ressource «: A black cube depicting the "Energy" resource
translation.Un cube vert représentant la ressource «: A green cube depicting the "Science" resource
translation.Un cube jaune représentant la ressource: A yellow cube depicting the "Gold" resource
translation.Un cube bleu représentant la ressource «: A blue cube depicting the "Exploration" resource
translation.Un cube rouge représentant la ressource: A red cube depicting the "Krystallium" resource

translation.Le joueur produisant seul le plus de Mat: The player producing the single most Materials receives a Financier token
translation.Le joueur produisant seul le plus d’Éner: The player producing the single most Energy receives a General token
translation.Le joueur produisant seul le plus de Sci: The player producing the single most Science receives a Financier or General token
translation.Le joueur produisant seul le plus d’Or g: The player producing the single most Gold receives a Financier token
translation.Le joueur produisant seul le plus d’Expl: The player producing the single most Exploration receives a General token

{player} produces {quantity, plural, one{# black cube} other{# black cubes}} (the Energy)
{player} produces {quantity, plural, one{# green cube} other{# green cubes}} (the Science)
{player} produces {quantity, plural, one{# yellow cube} other{# yellow cubes}} (the Gold)
{player} produces {quantity, plural, one{# blue cube} other{# blue cubes}} (the Exploration)
{player} produces {quantity, plural, one{# red cube} other{# red cubes}} (the Krystallium)

This player scores {quantity, plural, one{1 point} other{# points}} per green development (the Researches)
This player scores {quantity, plural, one{1 point} other{# points}} per yellow development (the Projects)
This player scores {quantity, plural, one{1 point} other{# points}} per blue development (the Discoveries)
translation.Il y a {discardLength} cartes dans la dé: There is {discardLength} cards in the discard pile.
translation.A fait attendre les autres (pondéré par: Made others wait (weighted by the number of awaited players)
